brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine if a single dose of IL-10 compared to placebo is
      safe and effective in reducing the incidence of post-ERCP acute pancreatitis for subjects
      with increased risk.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of IL-10 (Tenovil TM) in the Prevention of Post-ERCP Acute Pancreatitis (Study P02580)(TERMINATED)

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Double-Blind, Primary Purpose: Prevention
